meanings.definition: To place or add something on top of another thing.
meanings.sent1: She supered the book on the table.
meanings.sent2: He always supered extra cheese on his pizza.
meanings.sent3: The cat supered a toy mouse on top of the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: The sun supered its rays over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The chef supered a dollop of cream on the dessert.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in quality or degree.
meanings.sent1: The new movie supered all expectations.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness supered all other traits.
meanings.sent3: The joke supered all the others in making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His dedication supered any previous employee.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset supered any painting.
